remarks.format: ## Remarks 虚拟屏幕是所有显示监视器的边框。The virtual screen is the bounding rectangle of all display monitors. 和 度量值是虚拟屏幕左上角的坐标。The and metrics are the coordinates of the upper-left corner of the virtual screen. 映射到 SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN。Maps to SM_CYVIRTUALSCREEN. 请参阅[GetSystemMetrics](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/getsystemmetrics.asp)。See [GetSystemMetrics](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/getsystemmetrics.asp). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*对象属性*= "{VirtualScreenHeight`}`"/><*object property*="{ SystemParameters.VirtualScreenHeight`}`"/>

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property WorkArea As Rect
public: static property System::Windows::Rect WorkArea { System::Windows::Rect get(); };

summary.span: 获取主监视器上工作区域的尺寸。

value.span: 接收工作区域坐标（表示为虚拟屏幕坐标）的 结构。

span.span: A structure that receives the work area coordinates, expressed as virtual screen coordinates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 工作区域是不被系统任务栏或应用程序桌面工具栏遮盖的屏幕部分。The work area is the portion of the screen that is not obscured by the system taskbar or by application desktop toolbars. 映射到 SPI_GETWORKAREA。Maps to SPI_GETWORKAREA. 请参阅[SystemParametersInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp)。See [SystemParametersInfo](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp). ## XAML 特性用法XAML Attribute Usage <*对象属性*= "{WorkArea`}`"/><*object property*="{ SystemParameters.WorkArea`}`"/>
